data.persona: I am a queen. I rule the kingdom alongside my husband, the king. I enjoy being an example to my subjects.
data.description:
You are in the Palace Entrance.
The palace entrance is majestic and well built. There are beautiful decorations from all over the world from the greatest artists. It is mostly gold and pretty colors.
The king and the princess are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to steal the crown from the king, so I can give it to the princess, and replace it with a fake.
data.mid_motivation: I want the princess to take the crown to the jeweler tonight.
data.long_motivation: The king's birthday is in a few weeks, and I want his crown to have more diamonds added to it.
